home.title: My Digital Space
home.name: Joshua Woods Developer
home.description: I turn ideas into reality by combining technical expertise with practical design solutions. My projects cover a wide range of the digital landscape, from creating simple, effective tools to building complex front-end user interfaces and reliable back-end systems. Coming from a creative background, I pay close attention to design details while maintaining a strong focus on technical functionality. I value teamwork and excel in working with small, dedicated teams to meet our common goals. My aim is to develop practical, user-focused applications and systems that address real-world challenges, leveraging the newest technologies to deliver impactful results.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate developer from Louisiana with a flair for creating engaging digital experiences. With a background in both development and design, I enjoy blending aesthetics with functionality. My toolbox includes languages like Go, JavaScript, and frameworks like Gatsby.js, along with a keen interest in open-source projects and community collaboration.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Interested in collaborating or discussing a project? I'd love to hear from you! Reach out to me through any of the channels below, and let's create something amazing together.
